```{r}

ols <- function(data, formula) {
  
  mf <- model.frame(formula, data)
  y <- model.response(mf)
  X <- model.matrix(mf)
  
  K <- ncol(X)
  
  B <- solve(t(X)%*%X) %*% t(X) %*% y
  
  return(B)
  
}

```
